footer.tagline: Transforming lives across Afghanistan through charitable giving

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Afghanium is a social enterprise connecting Afghan producers with global customers. We promote authentic Afghan-made products—saffron, leather goods, rugs, and gemstones—helping farmers and artists earn through fair trade, not donations. A portion of our profit supports women-focused healthcare projects in Afghanistan, including women-only clinics staffed by women.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We're building a bridge from Afghan hands to global homes—and from global purchases to real, targeted support for women's healthcare. A sustainable model where dignified work creates both economic opportunity and humanitarian impact.

values.title: What We Stand For
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every action we take

dignity.title: Dignity Through Work
dignity.description: Fair opportunities for producers, farmers, and artists. We build market access, not dependency—reliable buyers, fair terms, and long-term relationships.

womensHealth.title: Women's Health
womensHealth.description: Profits reinvested into women-only healthcare initiatives. Healthcare remains one of the few spaces where women can contribute professionally and safely as both patients and professionals.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear reporting on what we fund and why. Every transaction is tracked. We provide full visibility into how resources are used and distributed.

quality.title: Quality & Compliance
quality.description: Responsible sourcing, documentation, and lawful trade practices. We ensure the highest standards in every product and every partnership.

Yes, AFGHANIUM is a registered charity and all donations are tax-deductible.

list.q: How can I track my donation?
list.a: Use your unique donation ID on the Track Donation page to see where your funds are being used.

list.q: What payment methods do you accept?
list.a: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, cryptocurrency, and bank transfers.

list.q: How do I know my donation is being used properly?
list.a: We provide full transparency through our tracking system and impact proofs showing exactly how funds are used.
